title: Welcome
text: Let's hope it works this time.

title: Delete button doesn't work
text: I disabled rendering the delete button because I couldn't get the delete function to work.

title: Something about the fs write maybe
text: The fs write seems to work, but the note list doesn't re-render, and the old array just gets written to the db again apparently.

title: Frustrating but oh well
text: It would have been nice to figure out, but it's just bonus points
